title: AN OPEN BIBLE FOR THE WORLD
author: Wm. J. Kirkpatrick

verses.text:
An open Bible for the world! May this our watchword be,
Wherever men in darkness dwell, all nations shall be free.
Let voices rise from earth's remotest bounds to greet that day,
God's Book shall be the light of all, the truth that lights the way.

An open Bible for the world! What though the mountains high,
The valleys deep, the desert sand, the raging seas defy.
God's Word shall conquer every foe, shall break down every wall,
And make the desert places bloom with Gospel truth for all.
